pageTitle: Victoria bus station closure Saturday 26 and Sunday 27 April

title.title: Victoria bus station closure Saturday 26 and Sunday 27 April

texts: On Saturday 26 April, Victoria bus station will be closed. It will remain closed until 16:00 on Sunday 27 April.
From 07:00 on Sunday 27 April, Terminus Place will also be closed.
The closures will allow emergency carriageway repair works to be carried out.
The following routes will be affected by the weekend closure; 2, 8, 11, 16, 36, 38, 44, 52, 73, 82, 148, 185, 170, 211, 436, C1, C10, N2, N8, N11, N16, N38, N44, N52, N73 and N136.
Details of diversions and stopping arrangements for the weekend will be available at local bus stops. around the bus station and online.
Bus station staff will also be available to advise passengers of where to catch their bus.
